EmailTemplate.name: Celebrating your Anniversary
EmailTemplate.subject: Nice to have you as a client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
This is just a note to say thank you for your business with us over the years.
Believe it of not, today is the anniversary of when we started working together. I would like to setup a meeting to review how we are doing, and to ensure we are meeting your needs as they stand today. Would you be open to that?
I look forward to talking to you soon.
Sincerely,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.OwnerPhone}
